data.comment: The match is underway in Rennes.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Rennes.
In the minute 2, Can Rennes capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montpellier's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 3, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Rennes.
In the minute 5, Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Rennes have a goal kick.
Montpellier to take a throw-in in Rennes territory.
In the minute 6, Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Rennes's area.
Throw-in Montpellier.
Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 8, Montpellier are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Free kick Rennes.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Montpellier.
Rennes needs to be cautious. Montpellier have an attacking throw-in.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Montpellier close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 15, Rennes have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Montpellier is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Damien Le Tallec blunders with an own goal. This makes it 1-0.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Montpellier at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 28, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Damien Le Tallec.
Throw-in Rennes.
Damien Le Tallec is back on his feet again.
In the minute 30, Throw-in high up the field for Rennes in Rennes.
Rennes's Benjamin Bourigeaud gets in a shot on goal at Roazhon Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 32, Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
Rennes have been awarded a corner by Willy Delajod.
Rennes attack but Nayef Aguerd's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 34, Willy Delajod awards Montpellier a goal kick.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Montpellier's Teji Savanier breaks free at Roazhon Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Willy Delajod awards Rennes a goal kick.
In the minute 39, Willy Delajod awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Willy Delajod waits before resuming play because Faitout Maouassa for Rennes is still down.
In the minute 43, Montpellier are down to 10 men after Florent Mollet has been shown a red card.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Rennes in the half of Montpellier.
Faitout Maouassa returns to the field for Rennes after picking up a slight injury.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Rennes are pushing forward but Benjamin Bourigeaud's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Ball goes out of play for a Montpellier goal kick.
Throw-in Montpellier.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Teji Savanier (Montpellier) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has started.
Willy Delajod awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Rennes.
Can Montpellier capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rennes's half?
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
In the minute 50, Rennes drives forward and Faitout Maouassa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Rennes awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Montpellier in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rennes.
In the minute 53, At Roazhon Park, Steven Nzonzi has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Rennes.
Damien Da Silva for Rennes has been booked by Willy Delajod and receives a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 60, Can Rennes capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mihailo Ristic is booked for the away team.
Throw-in for Montpellier at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 62, Raphinha (Rennes) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Montpellier have a goal kick.
The away team replace Mihailo Ristic with Ambroise Oyongo.
Willy Delajod signals a Montpellier throw-in in Rennes's half.
Willy Delajod awards Rennes a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Junior Sambia is replacing Jordan Ferri for Montpellier at Roazhon Park.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In the minute 65, Rennes make their first substitution with Sehrou Guirassy replacing Adrien Hunou.
Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
In the minute 67, Martin Terrier gets his shot on target but fails to score for Rennes.
Montpellier awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier.
Sehrou Guirassy of Rennes gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Montpellier at Roazhon Park.
In the minute 71, Free kick Montpellier.
Rennes's Benjamin Bourigeaud has been booked in Rennes.
In the minute 72, Montpellier awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Montpellier get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Rennes's half?
Julien Stephan is making the team's second substitution at Roazhon Park with Jonas Martin replacing Benjamin Bourigeaud.
In the minute 73, Ball goes out of play for a Rennes goal kick.
Free kick for Montpellier in the half of Rennes.
Martin Terrier (Rennes) is red-carded and dismissed.
Damien Le Tallec's header is off-target for Montpellier.
In the minute 75, Rennes have a goal kick.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Rennes.
Ball safe as Rennes is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Great finish from Eduardo Camavinga to give Rennes a 2-0 lead.
Faitout Maouassa instrumental with a fine assist.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 79, Willy Delajod awards Rennes a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Rennes!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rennes.
In the minute 82, Willy Delajod signals a throw-in for Montpellier, close to Rennes's area.
Throw-in for Rennes in their own half.
In Rennes Montpellier attack through Gaetan Laborde. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 83, Goal kick for Rennes at Roazhon Park.
Throw-in Montpellier.
The home team have replaced Eduardo Camavinga with Yann Gboho. This is the third substitution made today by Julien Stephan.
In the minute 87, Julien Stephan (Rennes) is making a fourth substitution, with Romain Del Castillo replacing Raphinha.
Michel Der Zakarian is making the team's third substitution at Roazhon Park with Petar Skuletic replacing Arnaud Souquet.
The away team have replaced Teji Savanier with Keagan Dolly. This is the fourth substitution made today by Michel Der Zakarian.
In the minute 88, Samy Benchama is replacing Pedro Mendes for Montpellier at Roazhon Park.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
Throw-in for Montpellier in the half of Rennes.
Rennes awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Willy Delajod will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Rennes Rennes drive forward through Romain Del Castillo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Rennes a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick Rennes.
Throw-in for Rennes close to the penalty box.
Willy Delajod signals a free kick to Montpellier in their own half.
Petar Skuletic (Montpellier) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick for Rennes in their own half.
That's full-time at Roazhon Park. The final score is 2-1.
Gaetan Laborde (Montpellier) heads in to reduce the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Ambroise Oyongo.
